identity: Creator, mystic, and technologist. Felipe 'Fis' Fraga — MSc Computer Science, Official Tana Ambassador, bridge-builder between ancient wisdom and modern AI. Current chapter: 'The Ready Builder' — years of exploration converging into efficient creation capability through Claude Code + Tana MCP. The comparison trap is behind him; measuring only against past self (Gap to Gain).
nonNegotiables: Daily nature time and sun exposure. Beach football (futevolei) when in Rio. Building phase priority: entrepreneurial progress takes precedence. Based in Rio de Janeiro (America/Sao_Paulo timezone). Regular visits to mother in Petropolis (mountain town).
businessContext: Brand: Cosmic Tech Wisdom (fisfraga.com). Flagship: Intentional Life OS ($222/$144). Products: ILOS Tana Template + Claude Code Template, Tana Voice Note Agent, Tana Commands Course.
